sentences.en: A community garden project in Harlem to increase - city youngsters'access to healthful food and safe recreation.
sentences.cn: 哈勒姆社区花园项目:增加市中心孩子们获得健康饮食和安全娱乐的途径.

sentences.en: Cab driver: Uptown? You headed into Harlem!
sentences.cn: 司机: 上城区? 你正朝哈林区去呢!

sentences.en: Children playing leap frog in a Harlem street, ca.
sentences.cn: 孩子在玩的飞跃青蛙在哈勒姆街, 长约.

sentences.en: I ran straight up to Columbia County, then turned East, came down the Harlem Valley and thence home.
sentences.cn: 我一直跑到哥伦比亚县，然后向东转，沿着哈勒姆山谷，从那里回到家。

sentences.en: In addition to her responsibilities at the hospital, she advocated number of window gates in Harlem.
sentences.cn: 除了她在医院的责任外, 她还主张在哈莱姆医院窗户安装窗门.

sentences.en: It was winter, and I was in Harlem.
sentences.cn: 这是一个冬天，我是在黑人住宅区。

sentences.en: Personnel Officer: Wanna work uptown nights ? South Bronx ? Harlem?
sentences.cn: 官员: 你夜里要去住宅区吗——南布朗克斯——黑人区?

sentences.en: So was Harlem: Tear gas hung in the air as I came out of the subway on West 96th Street.
sentences.cn: 黑人住宅区也是如此：我走出西区第96街的地铁站，空气中弥漫着催泪瓦斯。

sentences.en: The head of the World Health Organization , Harlem Brundtland, launched the international campaign in New Delhi.
sentences.cn: 世界卫生组织总干事 格罗?哈雷姆?布伦德兰在新德里宣布展开这一国际举措.

sentences.en: The study included children who were born to non-smoking Black and Dominican American women age 18 to 35 who resided in Washington Heights, Harlem or the South Bronx in New York.
sentences.cn: 研究中包括住在纽约华盛顿高地、黑人住宅区和南布朗克斯，年龄从18岁到35岁的妇女的孩子，他们的母亲是不吸烟的多米尼加人。

sentences.en: The white brothers looked uncomfortable and some of the Harlem brothers belligerent.
sentences.cn: 白人兄弟们似乎不大自在,而哈莱姆区来的兄弟却看上去斗志旺盛的.

sentences.en: The whole of Harlem seemed to fall apart in the swirl of snow.
sentences.cn: 整个哈莱姆区好象散落在纷纷扬扬的雪花中了.

sentences.en: We are excited on thehorizon – Ennio the Harlem and of course The One Festival.
sentences.cn: 我们对于即将发生的项目非常地兴奋:埃尼奥莫里康内,哈林花式篮球,当然还有完全音乐节.

sentences.en: We were just running over a little thing from Harlem.
sentences.cn: 我们刚刚在排练一些黑人的音乐.

sentences.en: You won't slander the political consciousness of the people of Harlem.
sentences.cn: 你不会低估哈莱姆区人民的政治觉悟了.
